vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of United Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Sa.8.10;
son of: Toi (H8583); also called Hadoram at 1Ch.18.10;
Also named: ha.do.ram (הֲדוֹרָם "Hadoram" H1913)
§ Joram = "Jehovah is exalted"
1) son of king Jehoshaphat of Judah and himself king of Judah for 8 years; his wife was the wicked Athaliah who was probably the instigator for his returning the nation of Judah to the worship of Baal
2) son of king Ahab of the northern kingdom of Israel and king of Israel himself for 12 years; he was murdered by Jehu on the plot of land for which his father had murdered Naboth thus fulfilling the prophecy of Elijah to the very letter
3) a Levite in the time of David and an ancestor of Shelomith
4) son of Toi, king of Hamath
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Toi, rey de Hamat; (b) יְהוֹרָם   hijo de Josafat; rey de Judá ; (c) יְהוֹרָם   hijo de Ahab; rey de Israel ; (d)   sacerdote; en tiempos de Josafat
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
約蘭 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和華是被稱頌的"
1) 猶大王約沙法的兒子, 他作猶大國的王八年; 其妻是邪惡的亞他利雅,
有可能他就是受此妻之蠱惑而使猶大國轉向去崇拜巴力
2) 北國以色列亞哈王的兒子, 在以色列作王十二年; 他被耶戶所謀殺
而棄屍於拿伯的田間, 因其父曾謀殺了拿伯, 這完全應驗了先知以利
亞所受的啟示
3) 一名利未人 (代上 26:25)
4) 哈馬王陀以的兒子 (撒下 8:10)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
约兰 这个阳性专有名词 人名在原文的意思是 "耶和华是被称颂的"
1) 犹大王约沙法的儿子, 他作犹大国的王八年; 其妻是邪恶的亚他利雅,
有可能他就是受此妻之蛊惑而使犹大国转向去崇拜巴力
2) 北国以色列亚哈王的儿子, 在以色列作王十二年; 他被耶户所谋杀
而弃尸于拿伯的田间, 因其父曾谋杀了拿伯, 这完全应验了先知以利
亚所受的启示
3) 一名利未人 (代上 26:25)
4) 哈马王陀以的儿子 (撒下 8:10)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the Kingdom of Israel, living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.1.17;
son of: Ahab (H0256) and Jezebel (H0348);
brother of: Joash (H3101H), Ahaziah (H0274) and Athaliah (H6271); also called Jehoram at 2Ki.1.17a; 3.1,6; 1x,6,7;
Also named: ye.ho.ram (יְהוֹרָם "Joram" H3088I)
§ Joram = "Jehovah is exalted"
1) son of king Jehoshaphat of Judah and himself king of Judah for 8 years; his wife was the wicked Athaliah who was probably the instigator for his returning the nation of Judah to the worship of Baal
2) son of king Ahab of the northern kingdom of Israel and king of Israel himself for 12 years; he was murdered by Jehu on the plot of land for which his father had murdered Naboth thus fulfilling the prophecy of Elijah to the very letter
3) a Levite in the time of David and an ancestor of Shelomith
4) son of Toi, king of Hamath

A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.26.25;
son of: Isshiah (H3449J);
father of: Zichri (H2147L)
§ Joram = "Jehovah is exalted"
1) son of king Jehoshaphat of Judah and himself king of Judah for 8 years; his wife was the wicked Athaliah who was probably the instigator for his returning the nation of Judah to the worship of Baal
2) son of king Ahab of the northern kingdom of Israel and king of Israel himself for 12 years; he was murdered by Jehu on the plot of land for which his father had murdered Naboth thus fulfilling the prophecy of Elijah to the very letter
3) a Levite in the time of David and an ancestor of Shelomith
4) son of Toi, king of Hamath

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A king of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ki.22.50;
son of: Jehoshaphat (H3092I);
brother of: Azariah (H5838Q), Jehiel (H3171J), Zechariah (H2148J), Azariahu (H5838R), Michael (H4317O) and Shephatiah (H8203K); married to Athaliah (H6271);
father of: Ahaziah (H0274H) and Jehosheba (H3089); also called Joram at 2Ki.8.21,23,24; 11.2; 2x
Another name of ye.ho.ram (יְהוֹרָם "Jehoram" H3088)
§ Joram = "Jehovah is exalted"
1) son of king Jehoshaphat of Judah and himself king of Judah for 8 years; his wife was the wicked Athaliah who was probably the instigator for his returning the nation of Judah to the worship of Baal
2) son of king Ahab of the northern kingdom of Israel and king of Israel himself for 12 years; he was murdered by Jehu on the plot of land for which his father had murdered Naboth thus fulfilling the prophecy of Elijah to the very letter
3) a Levite in the time of David and an ancestor of Shelomith
4) son of Toi, king of Hamath
